title: Advent
summary: Discover how Christian communities have marked the four weeks leading up to Christmas with prayer, fasting, and bright Advent wreaths.

title: Nativity of Jesus
summary: Explore the Gospel narratives describing the birth of Jesus in Bethlehem and the symbols that surround manger scenes worldwide.

title: Saint Nicholas
summary: Meet the charitable 4th‑century bishop whose secret gift‑giving inspired Santa Claus traditions across Europe.

title: Christmas Tree
summary: Trace the evergreen tree from medieval mystery plays to living rooms covered in tinsel, glass ornaments, and LEDs.

title: Bethlehem
summary: Learn about the West Bank city revered as the traditional site of the Nativity and its enduring pilgrimage routes.

title: Krampus
summary: Peek at the horned Alpine folkloric figure who punishes the naughty in contrast to Saint Nicholas rewards.

title: Yule Goat
summary: Follow the Scandinavian straw goat that once frightened children but now decorates Nordic towns and homes.

title: Christmas Market
summary: Stroll through festive European squares filled with mulled wine, gingerbread, carved toys, and choirs.

title: Poinsettia
summary: Find out how a Mexican winter bloom became a greenhouse staple that paints December red and gold.

title: Twelve Days of Christmas
summary: Unpack the accumulative carol, its disputed symbolism, and how it inspired endless parodies.

title: Weihnachtsmann
summary: Compare Germany’s secular gift‑bringer, evolved from Saint Nicholas yet distinct from North American Santa.

title: Wassailing
summary: Toast to good cider harvests and door‑to‑door singing traditions that predate modern caroling.

title: St. Lucy's Day
summary: Witness Swedish processions led by candle‑crowned Lucias bringing saffron buns to banish winter darkness.

title: The Nutcracker
summary: Dive into Tchaikovsky’s ballet, its fairy‑tale origins, and how it conquered holiday stages.

title: Christmas Truce of 1914
summary: Read about the unofficial World War I ceasefires when enemies shared carols, gifts, and soccer matches.

title: Las Posadas
summary: Join nine nights of candlelit processions reenacting Mary and Joseph’s search for shelter across Latin America.

title: Candy Cane
summary: Follow the striped sugar stick from German choirs to mass production and peppermint everything.

title: Hanukkah
summary: Understand the Festival of Lights, menorahs, dreidels, and why its date shifts on the Gregorian calendar.

title: Jólabókaflóðið
summary: Cozy up with Iceland’s "Christmas Book Flood," where gifting novels fuels an entire publishing season.

title: Christmas Pickle
summary: Investigate the quirky ornament hidden on trees so the keenest eye wins an extra present.

title: Panettone
summary: Taste the airy Milanese sweet bread that now travels worldwide in iconic dome‑shaped tins.

title: Little Drummer Boy
summary: Follow the mid‑20th century carol from Katherine K. Davis’ composition to countless covers and stop‑motion fame.

title: Feast of the Seven Fishes
summary: Feast on Italian American Vigil suppers packed with regional seafood favorites on Christmas Eve.

title: Midnight Mass
summary: Arrive at candlelit services welcoming Christmas Day across cathedrals and neighborhood parishes alike.
